import React from 'react' import {useForm} from 'react-hook-form' import History from './History' import {default as api} from '../reduxstore/apiSlice' function Form() { const {register, handleSubmit, resetField}=useForm() const [addTransaction] = api.useAddTransactionMutation() const onSubmit=async (data)=>{ if(!data) return {}; await addTransaction(data).unwrap(); } return (

Transaction

) } export default Form
